nodes.text: A B1 battle droid was stationed on the bridge of the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, and served under command of General Grievous.

In 22 BBY, this battle droid participated in the Battle of the Ryndellia system and later in the Battle of the Kaliida Nebula. The droid was eventually destroyed by Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker when he arrived on the ship to rescue senator Padmé Amidala, rigging the ship's navicomputer to set a course right into the nearby moon.
